review:
700H on Battlenet, matchmaking is horrendous, whether it's ranked or unrated. Don't recommend unless you have friends to play it.
They should bring back the original OW, which was more balanced and fun to play.
most of the bugs are fixed. it isnt a pay to win game as 80% of all content is available and the stuff that isnt can be earned by completing missions without spending any money.

A bad game, not fun to play and no expectations of it becoming any better.

Overwatch 2 is (Blizzard's) corrupt and rotten version of Overwatch 1; unfulfilled promises of PvE, horrible monetization, pandering, terrible balance and game design combined with a horrible community.
Releasing the game on Steam is nothing but a desperation attempt on Blizzard's part to inflate active players for their quarterly investor's report to mask the fact that a majority of the playerbase, including myself, are over it.
I've been playing Overwatch on and off since 2016. The core PvP gameplay is still fine. But everything surrounding it is godawful. Play it if you want, but do NOT spend any money on this garbage.

ã€‚

cat

Once upon a time, I had a cat, I had ten dollars, I would buy it food for eight dollars, bathe it often, and it was very sticky to me.

Later, I took it out to play, passers-by thought it was cute, they fed it cat food, ham sausage, I was very unhappy because it was mine. I wanted to carry it home, but he broke away from me and meowed at the person who gave it good food, I hugged him a few times and he didn't go with me, and scratched me, so I turned around and left.....

Later, I came across it by chance on the road, and it was dirty. Passers-by will only give it good food and play with it, but they will not take it home and bathe it. It saw me and followed me home, I shut it out, it meowed outside the door, it was very uncomfortable,
but I wouldn't want it anymore
.
